thread.title: Philly bus evacuated after snake found on board
thread.title_full: Philly bus evacuated after snake found on board - CBS News

author: CBS News
title: Philly bus evacuated after snake found on board
text:
PHILADELPHIA -- A snake caused quite the stir on a Philadelphia bus on Sunday.
CBS Philly reports a passenger boarded a Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority (SEPTA) bus on Sunday with a snake. The rider then lost control of the snake, an approximately 4-foot-long boa constrictor, according to officials.
The incident took place on the route 52 bus.
This man says he was thrown off 52 bus aftr snake got loose.He says she's gentle, SEPTA apparently didn't agree#CBS3 pic.twitter.com/r933Nf7Oag
â€” Rahel Solomon (@RahelCBS3) October 18, 2015 Passengers were evacuated from the bus near 52nd Street and Westminster Avenue.
Animal control was called out to the scene to retrieve the snake.
It is unclear if the snake has been returned to its owner.
